osvSchema.details: F-logic DataCube3 v1.0 is vulnerable to Incorrect Access Control due to an improper directory access restriction. An unauthenticated, remote attacker can exploit this, by sending a URI that contains the path of the configuration file. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to extract the root and admin password.
